Political and military crises continue in the world, and a new stage in the financial and economic crisis has begun.
In the background of these negative factors, Azerbaijan is developing and people's welfare is improving.
Azerbaijan is the island of stability in the world, the place of development.
There is a unity between the people and power in Azerbaijan, and all our initiatives are supported by the people.
The adoption of the first program on socio-economic development of the regions in 2004 was a historic event.
Over the last 11 years, we've had a great way to grow. Over the last 11 years 64,000 businesses have been created.
Gross domestic product increased 3.4 times. This is a worldwide record.
Our currency reserves were $ 1.8 billion in 2004, more than $ 50 billion today.
This increases our credit ratings and is a serious insurance against any unpleasant incident.
During these years 1 million 360 thousand new jobs have been created.
In 2004, the average monthly salary was $ 100, and now it is $ 565.
The average monthly pension was $ 24, which is currently $ 221.
For the last 11 years, 84 settlements were set up for IDPs and 210,000 were relocated to new apartments.
Economic power allows us to say our word without hesitation at the political stage. No one can speak with us in dictatorship.
Azerbaijan is a modern and prosperous state, and a society that is closely linked to its roots.
Armenia is not only a colonial country, but it is not even worthy of a servant.
The national dignity of the Armenians is trampled by the criminal junta that governs them, and recent events once again show that.
We must successfully implement the third regional development program until 2018.
The economic, financial crisis may well await us in the future.
But we must be ready for these challenges and are ready.
Foreign debt accounts for only 8 percent of the gross domestic product. We can pay this debt in one day.
In the future, the driving force of the Azerbaijani economy will be our export potential.
We must provide ourselves with 100% foodstuffs and export it.
They expect the growth of Azerbaijani product in the markets of neighboring countries. We must go to European markets.
There are great successes in combating corruption and bribery.
Azerbaijan should also be an exemplary country in civil-relations relations.
Officers are servants of the people. I have repeatedly said that I am the first servant of the people.
Today, there is a rare Azerbaijani model of development in the world.
Azerbaijan's consistent, successful development will continue.
